settings.title: Metal Gate Buying Guide
settings.text:
Metal gates provide a stylish, durable, and secure entrance to your home or business. Whether you're looking for a garden gate, driveway gate, or side entrance gate, choosing the right style and specification is essential for both aesthetic appeal and functionality.

This guide will walk you through everything you need to consider when selecting a metal gate, from design options and materials to installation tips and maintenance.

settings.title: Why Choose a Metal Gate?
settings.text:
Durability – Our metal gates are made from galvanised powder-coated steel, offering excellent strength and corrosion resistance. While powder coating helps prevent rust, regular maintenance is still recommended to address scratches or chips that may expose the metal underneath.

Security – A metal gate creates a strong barrier for your property, with available locking options including heavy-duty latches and security bolts.

Low Maintenance – Metal gates require minimal upkeep compared to timber. Occasional cleaning and touch-ups on scratches help maintain longevity.

Versatile Designs – Our range includes traditional wrought iron designs, contemporary minimalist frames, and ornate decorative styles to suit different property aesthetics.

settings.title: Altarnun
settings.image_text: The Altarnun Gate range blends stylish design with practical security, making it a great choice for garden entrances, pathways, and driveways. The bow top design adds a distinctive touch, combining aesthetics with functionality to enhance any outdoor space.

settings.title: Callington
settings.image_text:
The Callington Gate range offers a traditional and practical solution for garden entrances, pathways, and driveways. Crafted from high-quality solid steel, these gates provide exceptional strength and durability, featuring an elegant bow top design with decorative scrollwork that adds a classic, timeless appeal.

Finished with a black powder coating, Callington gates are built for long-lasting resistance to rust and weathering, requiring minimal maintenance. Designed for easy installation, they include threaded eyelets welded onto the gate frame, adjustable hinge brackets, and a secure latch, ensuring a reliable and secure fit.

settings.title: Metal Gate Posts
settings.text: For a secure and polished gate installation, metal fence posts provide essential support and stability while enhancing aesthetics. Built for durability and weather resistance, they ensure long-lasting performance for both residential and commercial use.

settings.title: Ballast
settings.text: Start your foundations right with high-quality ballast, a durable mix of sand and gravel designed for strong, stable concrete. Perfect for foundations, driveways, and structural support, it ensures reliable drainage and long-lasting strength for any project.

settings.title: Post Mix Concrete
settings.text: Set your posts securely with Fencemate Post Concrete, a fast-setting, ready-to-use mix designed for fence posts, gate posts, and decking supports. Just add water for fast and reliable anchoring, ensuring stability and durability in any outdoor project
